verbs.description: [ARG0: Actor Peter Fonda] [V: targeted] [ARG1: President Donald Trump 's 12-year - old son Barron] [ARGM-LOC: in a late - night Twitter rant about the separation of immigrant families at the U.S. border] . " We should rip Barron Trump from his mother 's arms and put him in a cage with pedophiles , " the actor wrote in an all - caps rant that he later deleted . " And see if mother will stand up against the giant [ expletive ] she is married to . " The U.S. Secret Service told TheWrap that is aware of the tweet but declined to offer any additional comments .
